title: Stuck on Loading Screen
body:
I'm currently stuck on a loading screen where the loading wheel doesn't seem to move and the loading % for everyone isn't increasing. 

Can someone help?
Edit: I got one of these a while back but thought it was a one 
time thing.

Edit: Welp, I got Leaverbuster.... sigh......

replies.body: It sounds to me like you might have completely lost your connection to the game server you playing on if those loading %'s never went up at all. I'd suggest going through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to double check for any weird network settings first. Hit me back up if you're still not able to get into any games, and make sure to try these changes in a custom match first!
